title: I
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''i''' will bring up your inventory.
*Pressing '''I''' will bring up your memorized spells.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''i''' represents a [[List of spriggans|spriggan]]-type monster.
*'''I''' represents an [[ice beast]] or a [[sky beast]].
